---
title: "Butternut Squash & Sweet Potato Soup"
description: |
  Vegetarian, delightful soup that is delicious any time of year.
date: 03-20-2021
categories:
  - soup
  - vegetarian
---

## Ingredients

* 1 onion
* 6 cups veggie broth
* 4 cups butternut squash, peeled, seeded, and cubed
* 3 cups sweet potato, peeled and diced
* 3 carrots, peeled and sliced
* 1 can cannellini beans
* 1/4 teaspoon salt

## Directions

* Add all ingredients to the slow cooker, and secure the lid, cook on low for 6 hours or high for 3.
* Alternatively, 30 minutes in the Instant Pot.
* Blend to make a smooth soup.
